message: Starting phase review - gathering task context and deliverables
Reviewing task findings and agent outputs to verify deliverables
Verifying implementation: state_db enhanced, real_mcp_server and dashboard API using SQLite. Testing runtime behavior.
Summarizing findings - Core schema implemented, migration partially complete but dashboard API needs testing

Review completed. Verdict: needs_revision. Found good progress on schema enhancements and API integration, but critical gaps remain: no populated SQLite database, missing dashboard functions, and active dual-write pattern to JSON. 3 praise items, 5 issues/blockers documented.
